include(ExternalProject)

add_library(lua      STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
add_library(glfw     STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
add_library(glew     STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
add_library(assimp   STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
add_library(zlib     STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
add_library(freetype STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)

if(WIN32)
	set_target_properties(lua    PROPERTIES IMPORTED_IMPLIB "${DEPS_DIR}/lib/lua.lib")
	set_target_properties(glfw3  PROPERTIES IMPORTED_IMPLIB "${DEPS_DIR}/lib/glfw3.lib")
	set_target_properties(glew   PROPERTIES IMPORTED_IMPLIB "${DEPS_DIR}/lib/glew32.lib")
	set_target_properties(assimp PROPERTIES IMPORTED_IMPLIB "${DEPS_DIR}/lib/assimp-vc143-mtd.lib")
elseif(UNIX)
	set_target_properties(lua    PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${DEPS_DIR}/lib/liblua.a")
	set_target_properties(glfw   PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${DEPS_DIR}/lib/libglfw3.a")
	find_package(GLEW REQUIRED)
	set_target_properties(assimp PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${DEPS_DIR}/lib/libassimp.a")
	set_target_properties(zlib   PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${DEPS_DIR}/lib/libz.a")
	set_target_properties(freetype PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${DEPS_DIR}/lib/libfreetype.a")
endif()
